name: @moonsong-labs/moonwall-monorepo
description: Testing framework for the Moon family of projects

scripts.clean-all: rm -rf node_modules && pnpm -r --filter='./packages/**' run clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.pristine-build: pnpm clean-all && pnpm i && pnpm build && pnpm generate-types
scripts.test: pnpm exec moonwall test 'basic chopsticks dev_seq chop_state_test'
